entry.title: BLOWING SNOW ADVISORY , Rocky Harbour
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:24 AM NDT Sunday 19 March 2023

entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT ENDED, Rocky Harbour
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:25 AM NDT Sunday 19 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 2.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Berry Hill 05:30 AM NDT Sunday 19 March 2023
Temperature: 2.0°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.8 kPa falling
Humidity: 81 %
Dewpoint: -0.9°C
Wind: SE 18 km/h gust 39 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday: Rain or snow. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Rain changing to flurries this afternoon. Risk of freezing rain early this morning. Periods of snow inland and over higher terrain this morning and early this afternoon. Rainfall amount 2 to 4 mm. Snowfall amount 5 cm inland and over higher terrain. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming southwest 40 gusting to 60 late this afternoon. High plus 3. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NDT Sunday 19 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Flurries. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Flurries. Blowing snow over exposed areas overnight. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 11 overnight. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NDT Sunday 19 March 2023

entry.title: Monday: Snow and blowing snow. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Snow and blowing snow. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 70 becoming west 60 gusting to 80 near noon. High minus 1. Wind chill near minus 11. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NDT Sunday 19 March 2023
